headline: PTC Partners with Microsoft and Volkswagen Group to Develop Codebeamer Generative AI Copilot
summary: PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) today announced that it has partnered with Microsoft and Volkswagen Group to develop a generative artificial intelligence (AI) copilot based on the PTC Codebeamer® application lifecycle management (ALM) solution. Codebeamer Copilot will support software development in physical products by enabling software engineers to create and manage product requirements more efficiently as well as test, validate, and release them.
